text: The Guadalupe bass (Micropterus treculii) is a species of fish. It is found in the U.S. state of Texas. It is a rare type of fish. It is found in rivers such as the Guadalupe River. As of 2023, it is a near-threatened species. == References == Category:Centrarchidae Category:IUCN Red List data deficient species Category:Near threatened species Category:Edible fish
title: Guadalupe bass
